name: Smart TV Box Endless Runner
description:
Play with TV Remote this Infinite Runner game on Smart TV Boxes and other mobile devices

Run and Escape monster while collecting life and points in this amazing new game running on both Mobile, Tablets and Smart TV

Official Website: https://www.smarttvboxgames.com/

Compatible Smart TV Boxes:

This game can be played on: Pendoo T95, Xiaomi Mi Box S, Chromecast, Beelink GT King Pro, NVIDIA SHIELD Android TV Pro, Q Plus Android Box, Roku Ultra

@smarttvgames | Linktree
